name: Haroun EL ALAMI
title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer | Tech Lead
summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience in full-stack development, technical leadership, and cloud-native solutions. Proven expertise in designing, building, and optimizing enterprise-scale applications with Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, and Angular. Strong background in DevOps, Kubernetes, and AWS, combined with mentoring and code quality leadership. Enthusiastic about AI/ML, process mining, and performance engineering, with a strong ability to bridge technical depth and business needs.

skills.items: Kubernetes, Helm, Docker, AWS, Jenkins, GitHub Actions
R, Python, BPMN, Process Mining, AI/ML (enthusiast)

bullets: Led development and optimization of Bonita runtimes for scalability and performance.
Designed and implemented a real-time monitoring dashboard for applications, processes, and license management.
Built a performance testing solution with Gatling, Scala, Docker, AWS.
Conducted R&D on data mining, process mining, and BPMN model generation.
Ensured code quality through reviews, mentoring, and technical leadership.
Exploring and prototyping next-generation AI-powered solutions by leveraging LangGraph and LightRAG for intelligent business workflow automation and agent-based process orchestration.
Developed a Spring Boot API for enterprise data aggregation (KYC).
Served as Tech Lead on 3 projects, overseeing delivery quality and CI/CD pipelines.
Implemented automated delivery pipelines with Jenkins to reduce deployment costs.
Mentored new hires and conducted code reviews.
Developed a cloud supervision tool for SmartTrade platforms.
Built a QA automation framework for functional UI testing integrated into CI/CD.
Created a Docker-based deployment platform for SmartTrade environments.
Designed Jira REST API-based dashboards for release tracking.
Built web/mobile applications for SMEs and organizations (management apps, WordPress sites).
Developed academic projects (career platforms, event booking, GIS wildfire simulation).

projects.name: dockerify-android
projects.title: Dockerized Android Emulator
projects.description: Developed a Docker-based Android emulator supporting multiple CPU architectures (x86, arm64 planned), with ADB integration and scrcpy-web for browser-based real-time control. The project has gained strong community traction with 350+ stars and 29 forks on GitHub.

projects.name: Getjobs
projects.title: Job Search Engine
projects.description: Designed and developed a career platform with job search and CV builder using Vue.js, Laravel, and REST APIs.

projects.name: PyTank
projects.title: Educational Python Game
projects.description: Built a gamified learning platform to teach Python through algorithmic tank battles.

projects.name: YHEventApp
projects.title: Event Booking Web App
projects.description: Implemented a system to manage event registrations and visualizations with PHP, MySQL, and Chart.js.

projects.name: University Management System
projects.title: University Management System
projects.description: Created an application for academic management (students, schedules, grades) with automated timetable generation.

education.degree: Master's in Software Reliability, Security & Integration
